definition: testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]

sentences.english: In men, low testosterone levels can cause a loss of bone mass.
sentences.chinese: 对于男性来说，睾丸激素低水平会导致骨量的流失。

sentences.english: The cardinal clinical manifestation was painless solid enlargement of the testis.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸无痛性肿大为其主要临床表现。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT OBJECTIVE:To determine the value of color Doppler ultrasound examination in diagnosis of testis and epididymis diseases.
sentences.chinese: 探讨彩色多普勒超声检查诊断睾丸附睾疾病的价值。

sentences.english: But his most important victory was against testicular cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是他打得最漂亮的一场仗是战胜了睾丸癌。

sentences.english: The damaging effects of alcohol on testosterone are made even worse when you exercise before drinking.
sentences.chinese: 若您运动后饮酒，酒精对睾丸酮的负面影响更加严重。

sentences.english: Tana was just a puppy when doctors noticed she had testicles.
sentences.chinese: 当医生发现Tana长了睾丸时，她还只是只小狗。

sentences.english: Objective The regulation of hormonal secretion in dispersed Leydig cell of rhesus monkey.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究恒河猴睾丸的激素分泌及其调节作用。

sentences.english: Objective: To establish a dog model of testis autotransplantation with a modified technique.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨建立犬自体睾丸移植模型的手术改进方法。

sentences.english: The results may be linked to levels of testosterone -the male sex hormone.
sentences.chinese: 这样的结果可能与男性荷尔蒙睾丸素的量有关。

sentences.english: If you suspect that you have a low testosterone level, consult your doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你怀疑自己体内睾丸素偏低，请咨询个人医生。

sentences.english: There are some lumps on his testicles.
Superoxide dismutase activity in testicular tissue.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸组织中超氧化物歧化酶的活性。

sentences.english: In men, androgens are produced primarily by the testes and the adrenal glands.
sentences.chinese: 男人雄激素主要由睾丸和肾上腺产生。

sentences.english: The day of growth inflection point is puberty.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸的拐点日龄和公猪的初情期接近。

sentences.english: On the other hand, he did have extremely low levels of the sex hormone testosterone.
sentences.chinese: 而另一方面，他的性激素睾丸酮水平确实极度低下。

sentences.english: A few hourslater, the man felt excruciating pain in one of his testicles.
sentences.chinese: 随后的几个小时里，他感到自己的一个睾丸疼痛无比。
